entries.femaleVariant: Night City is still in a state of mourning following the death of Arasaka CEO Saburo Arasaka.
Flags on all city buildings were lowered to half-mast and all major public events have been postponed until further notice.
Daughter and heiress, Hanako Arasaka, recently arrived in the city in the wake of the tragedy.
A wake will be held at Arasaka Headquarters tomorrow at noon, after which the late CEO's remains will be transported to their final resting place back in his native Japan.
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="ご冥福をお祈りいたします" t="Rest in peace." b="" a=""/>
